parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Access token is used to access personal user data. The token is obtained via authentication and has expiration time.
parameters.name: access_token

list.description: Method returns partial list of players who have ever accessed in any Wargaming game. The list is filtered by name or by initial characters of user name and sorted alphabetically.

errors.description: Search parameter not specified with no account_id
Search parameter is not long enough. Allowed value depends on type parameter.

list.name: List of accounts

parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description:
Name of the game to player search. If the parameter is not specified, search will be executed across known games. Valid values:

  • "wotb" — World of Tanks Blitz
  • "wot" — World of Tanks
  • "wows" — World of Warships
  • "wotg" — World of Tanks Generals
  • "wowp" — World of Warplanes
parameters.name: game

parameters.description:
Search type. Default is startswith. Valid values:

  • "startswith" — Search by initial part of player name (case insensitive). Minimum length: 3 characters. Maximum length: 24 characters. (by default)
  • "exact" — Search by exact match of player name (case insensitive). Indication of list of names, separated by commas is allowed (up to 100 values)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Search bar by player name. Search type and minimum string length depend on "type" parameter. If "exact" search type is used, indication of list of names, separated by commas is allowed.
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, an limit of None is applied (by default).
parameters.name: limit

glossary.description: Method returns information on clan entities in World of Tanks and World of Warplanes.
glossary.name: Clan glossary

This parameter changes members field type. Valid values:

  • "id" — Members field will contain associative array with account_id indexing in response
parameters.name: members_key

parameters.description:
Name of the game to perform the clan search in. If the parameter is not specified, search will be executed across World of Tanks. Valid values:

  • "wot" — World of Tanks (by default)
  • "wowp" — World of Warplanes
parameters.name: game

list.description:
Method searches and sorts clans by the following logic:

  • exact match of clan tag placed first
  • exact match of clan name placed second
  • name or tag matches are placed next
  • all comparisons are performed case insensitive
  • expression [wg] is converted to wg and considered as the clan tag
  • search for expression "[wg] clan" is performed by exact match of clan name and tag

Disbanded, NPC and technically frozen clans are excluded from response. Search is executed across World of Tanks and World of Warplanes.

fields.description: Information on clan emblems in games and on clan portal
name: emblems

list.name: Clans

parameters.description:
Sorting. Multiple parameters must be divided by commas. To sort in descending order, add '-' before the parameter. Valid values:

  • "fct" — battle efficiency
  • "dmg" — damage caused
  • "frg" — enemies destroyed
  • "spt" — enemies spotted
  • "cpt" — base capture points
  • "dpt" — base defense points
  • "gpl" — number of battles
parameters.name: order_by

matches.description: Method returns information about the matches in tournaments.

fields.description: Match position in the bracket. 'winner' and 'loser' — corresponding branches for winners and losers. If it is the first round, field value is 'null'.
name: bracket

fields.description: ID of the next match in the tournament for the left team. If there is no match, field value is 'null'.
name: left_next_match_id

fields.description: Match results for the left team. In case of no results, field value is 'null'. If the team is disqualified, field value is '-1 '.
name: left_score

fields.description: ID of the left team participating in the tournament
name: left_team_id

fields.description: ID of the next match in the tournament for the right team. If there is no match, field value is 'null'.
name: right_next_match_id

fields.description: Match results for the right team. In case of no results, field value is 'null'. If the team is disqualified, field value is '-1 '.
name: right_score

fields.description: ID of the right team participating in the tournament
name: right_team_id

fields.description: Match start time. If the match has not started yet, field value is 'null'.
name: start_at

fields.description: Date of the last match info update
name: updated_at

matches.name: Matches of the tournament

  • "zh-cn" — 简体中文
  • "tr" — Türkçe
  • "cs" — Čeština
  • "th" — ไทย
  • "vi" — Tiếng Việt
  • "ko" — 한국어
parameters.name: language

parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 1000). If the limit sent exceeds 1000, an limit of 100 is applied (by default).
parameters.name: limit
